value:
Heh... So, this is the medallion's true
power? Come, chaos, and pour forth
with rage! Seething, swirling rage!

In the world I have created, only
the strongest may live. The sooner
the weaklings perish, the better.

The light in which future generations
view my works is dependent only on
my ability to see my vision complete.

Class, rank...human, sub-human...
None of it matters. The weak submit
to the strong. THAT is peace.

Fly, Rajaion! Spare no mercy for the
weaklings! Rend their soft flesh for
your master!

I hope you put up more of a fight
than $Nf did.

GGGRRAAAAAGGGGHHHH!!!
GGRRAAAHH HAAA HAAA HAAA!!!
...It...feels...so...GOOOOOOD...

There is more, so much more...
I have yet to tap into even a shred
of my true strength.

This cannot be all the medallion has
to offer, can it?

Yes... More, MORE! Give me all the
power you have to give...

I am Ashnard, thirteenth king of
Daein. I will change the very face
of this world...with strength alone!

Order must be kept by a firm hand.
The strong create the framework
upon which a stable society rests.$k$pMeanwhile, the weak meekly inhabit
that stability, content with their
scraps. That is my vision for rule.$k$pSo... What will it be for you? Will you
follow or lead? Obey or command?
Serve or be served?$k$pThe weak can only hope to survive
by accepting their lot. Those who
do not...must die.$k$pNow, bring this world to its knees,
and claim it all your own!
はあっ
せいっ！
ぬっ…
なんと…
Excellent! So good!
Hehehahahahah!
Don't disappoint me!
I will bring the fight to you.
More, I say!
Soft but sinister laugh
Release your rage! Release your hate! Show me the fury you keep inside!
Who are you, dog? I have no time to spend on weaklings. Disappear.
Only those with power will be allowed to live. Hurry and die, weakling!
Despise me! Let your hate build and attack me with everything you have!
My sole desire is to rule through strength. The weak perish, and the strong live on...
Gawain's son... I'm looking forward to finding out whether or not you are worthy to face me.
I haven't seen all you are capable of... I'll enjoy my time here a little longer.
How wonderful!
Hmm...
I leave it to you.
